It's 3 August 2015 & 8 March 2015I've demonstrated post Time Formats from my thread. It changes according to what's been selected. demonstration1demonstration2demonstration3Trust summary time formats don't alter with any combination. Is it something you'd like changed?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Date format in the trust page is not "hard coded" since it is saved to the forum's database. It's just not affected when changing the time format, it probably has date data type. While i might agree that it should be changed too when changing the time format since it's describe that its "throughout this forum". But theymos could just change the "Time Format" description instead that only post time format are affected.

comments.author: DdmrDdmr
comments.created_time: December 13, 2022, 09:32:04 AMLast edit: December 13, 2022, 01:43:39 PM by DdmrDdmr
comments.body: Since the Trust module is an add-on custom development, and therefore is not part of the core SMF version, it may be something that was left out in the programming. The SMF function timeformat (date and time) takes into account the user settings, so it’s possible that the dates on the Trust page are not using the flexibility of the format function for one reason or another.
